channel.title: "Item has been dropped"
channel.description: Well, I am in a hurry, so I don't really know what to post. I saw this in a source awhile back. When an item is dropped, it sends the message to everybody saying, "Blah has been dropped". I need a method that will do that, or any ideas that can construct it. Basically I just need a kick and I can do the rest. Any ideas? Obviously it is in the NPCHandler class. I feel really stupid asking something like this, but that's okay. :)

item.title: "Item has been dropped"
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Brainstorming, you could probably use the getItemName method along with a switch statement for the dropped item.

Read full topic

item.title: "Item has been dropped"
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Oops, I misread what you said. What _™ suggested will work.
I can’t think of a reason for you to use a switch statement though.

Read full topic
